page.title: 17HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION
page.content: There are several caravan and chalet sites in the area. At{MEREBROOK}there are 160 fixed caravans,touring caravans can also use the site.It is beautifully situated next to the River Derwent. At{WAKEBRIDGE,}there are facilities for touring caravans.It is very near Crich Stand,The Tramway Museum and near the site of Wakebridge Manor House. At {PLAISTOW GREEN }there is a Riding School and there are 4 chalets for people who want riding holidays. There is also 1 Public House offering residential facilities:-{DERWENT HOTEL WHATSTANDWELL _5 bedrooms. There are also several houses offering Bed and Breakfast.
